articles.description: "We can fly where you want to, we can leave your house behind," the parody says. "But if your friends don't mask, well, they won't fly this airline."
articles.content:
Here are 6 tips to know before you book your flight during the COVID-19 pandemic.
USA TODAY
Friends who don't mask are the new friends who don't dance.
If you caught that "Safety Dance" reference,… [+2789 chars]
